template<class T>
void HStackedLayout::setItemPos ( QList< T * > const &  items,
T *  item,
qreal  y,
qreal  minX = 0.0,
qreal  spacing = 0.0 
) [inline]

Sets the position of an item based on its index in the list using horizontal stacking.

Parameters:
[in] items The list of items. Assumed to be already in correct order.
[in] item The item to position.
[in] y The y coordinate for the item's position.
[in] minX The minimum x coordinate.
[in] spacing The spacing between the items.

template<class T>
void HStackedLayout::updateItemMove ( QList< T * > &  items,
T *  item,
qreal  minX = 0.0,
qreal  spacing = 0.0 
) [inline]

Updates the horizontal stacking of the items when one item is being moved.

Parameters:
[in] items The list of items.
[in] item The item that is being moved.
[in] minX The minimum x coordinate.
[in] spacing The spacing between the items.
Remarks:
The list of items is assumed to initially have correct left-right ordering and positioning.
